Mayor and City Council

The City Council usually meets the 3rd Monday of each month at 7:00 p.m.

City Hall 195 W. Reno Road, Azle, Texas 76020-6001

The governing body, known as the City Council, consists of a Mayor and five Council Member’s, who are elected by places.

Hector Bas Mayor Kevin Vandenberg Place 1 Jennifer Vogle Mayor Pro Tem- Place 2 Shelli Swift Place 3 Ed Braun Deputy Mayor Pro Tem- Place 4 Edward Payne Place 5
City of Reno
